Table	Create Table
sites	CREATE TABLE `sites` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `centreId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `siteNumber` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `description` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `size` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `maxTables` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `powerAvailable` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `restrictions` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `pricePerDay` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '150.00',
  `pricePerWeek` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '750.00',
  `instantBooking` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `imageUrl1` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `imageUrl2` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `imageUrl3` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `imageUrl4` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `videoUrl` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `isActive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `mapMarkerX` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `mapMarkerY` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `floorLevelId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `weekendPricePerDay` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `sites_centreId_shopping_centres_id_fk` (`centreId`),
  KEY `centreId_idx` (`centreId`),
  KEY `sites_floorLevelId_floor_levels_id_fk` (`floorLevelId`),

  CONSTRAINT `sites_floorLevelId_floor_levels_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`floorLevelId`) REFERENCES `6yeAhZnHexQXKcGnnUhDLE`.`floor_levels` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=330001
